name: Spirit Link
description:
This game is an entry for Extra Credits Game Jam #4. 

Spirit Link is a small game about collecting the spirits of monsters by killing them with a magical attack. The collected spirits allow you to gain the powers of the monsters you killed, which in turn allows you to navigate through the levels successfully to find the four puzzle pieces that will lead you home.

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left mouse button or Control to shoot a more damaging, but killing shot
Right mouse button or Shift to shoot a less damaging shot that will cause the enemy's spirit to be collected

If you're curious, you can check out the game's Github repo here.
